desc: The only Apple-certified book on Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard, this  comprehensive reference takes support technicians and ardent Mac users  deep inside their operating systems, covering everything from  networking technologies to system administration, customizing the  operating system, command-line programming, and more. Keyed to the  learning objectives of the  AppleCertified Technical Coordinator  certification exam, the lessons in this self-paced volume serve as a  perfect supplement to Apple’s own training class and a first-rate  primer for computer support personnel who need to troubleshoot and  optimize Mac OS X as part of their jobs. Self-quizzes and chapter tests  reinforce the knowledge gained along the way.
title: Apple Training Series: Mac OS X Server Essentials (2nd Edition)
